channel.title: Self service on Service Catalog Tools Workshop
channel.description: Recent content in Self service on Service Catalog Tools Workshop

item.title: Using AWS Service Catalog
item.description: What are we going to do? We are going to perform the following steps: Create a portfolio for sharing products Share the portfolio networking-optional into a spoke account Step by step guide Here are the steps you need to follow to “Using AWS Service Catalog” Create a portfolio for sharing products Navigate to the ServiceCatalogFactory CodeCommit repository Click on portfolios, then networking.yaml and click “Edit”.
